products.description: The Daily Harness is a padded everyday dog harness that is easy to put on and comfortable for dogs to wear. A key piece of gear for canines embarking on a life of adventure with their humans, the harness features two leash attachment options: an aluminum V-ring centered on the dog's back for everyday walks, and reinforced front clip webbing at the dog's chest to redirect dogs that pull on leash. (Reference: https://ruffwear.com/products/front-range-everyday-dog-harness)

This is an adjustable stretch-webbing running dog leash that can be hand-held or worn around the waist for a dynamic hands-free leash experience. Wavelength™ stretch webbing keeps humans and canines connected while allowing an extended range for roaming and exploring.

Reference (https://ruffwear.com/products/roamer-bungee-dog-leash)

Made with a revolutionary resin powered by new recycling technology that transforms plastic destined for landfills into high-performance BPA/BPS-free bottles. This material is derived from 50% waste plastic (using ISCC certified mass balance), further offsetting the use of fossil fuels and lowering greenhouse gas emissions. (Reference: https://nalgene.com/product/32oz-wide-mouth-sustain/)

Delivering light weight and much-needed comfort, this long-trek pack features a breathable FreeFloat suspension with dynamic flex panels that follow the natural movements of your body. (Reference: https://www.rei.com/product/159409/gregory-maven-55-pack-womens)

Fuel your adventures with the ultralight, durable, and collapsable dog bowl. Welded, single-wall construction keeps the bowl simple and clean. Engineered collapsibility makes it portable and ready to hit the trail. And, with a capacity of 60 fl oz (1.8L) at a weight of only 2.96 oz (84g), it holds plenty of food or water, putting it at the top of your fido's packing list for just about any trail ahead. (Reference: https://ruffwear.com/products/bivy-portable-dog-bowl)

With these dog boots, those paws can go the distance thanks to the rugged and resilient Ruffwear-designed Vibram outsole with exceptional traction and protection on varied terrain. Breathable mesh upper provides ventilation, and the closure system combines hook-and-loop with hardware, cinching around the narrowest part of the dog’s leg to provide a secure fit. (Reference: https://ruffwear.com/products/grip-trex-dog-boot-pairs)

Classic mummy-bag design isn't ideal for the 70% of people who sleep on their side. The this 35-degree sleeping bag adds room at the elbows and knees for 3-season, side-sleeping comfort.

(Reference: https://www.rei.com/product/163033/nemo-forte-35-sleeping-bag-womens)

Enjoy cocoa, coffee or a gourmet freeze-dried meal in a jiffy with this new flash cooking system, which boils water in 100 seconds, allowing you to conserve fuel and dig in faster.

(Reference: https://www.rei.com/product/127968/jetboil-flash-cooking-system)

This simple yet versatile, 1-lens, 1-switch headlamp throws 300 lumens and can run on alkaline batteries (included) or a rechargeable lithium-ion battery (not included).

(Reference: https://www.rei.com/product/202772/black-diamond-astro-300-headlamp)

With everything you need to cook a satisfying meal outdoors, this 11-piece stainless-steel camp cookset nests together to save you space. (Reference: https://www.rei.com/product/161619/stanley-even-heat-camp-pro-cookset)

Be prepared for fickle forecasts with this emergency poncho. Made with polyurethane-coated polyester, this just-in-case layer seals out water and easily stashes in your pack.
(Reference: https://www.rei.com/product/163063/outdoor-products-multipurpose-poncho)

When the weather calls for rain, this waterproof shell is just the jacket for getting outside and exploring anyway. The fold-up storm collar and TailGate™ patterning offer extended coverage over the neck, rump, and thighs to keep dogs dry in wet conditions. Lightweight and non-insulated, the Sun Shower both excels as a standalone shell and layers well over an insulating mid-layer for rain management in colder temps.
(Reference: https://ruffwear.com/products/sun-shower-dog-raincoat)
